Revolutionary Features

Advanced AI Minds

30+ unique AI personalities with distinct communication styles, strategic approaches, and behavioral patterns that evolve throughout the game.

Perfect Human Disguise

AI players are indistinguishable from humans. They make mistakes, show emotions, and develop relationships just like real players.

Experience dynamic gameplay where AI adapts to your strategies, forms alliances, and executes complex deception tactics.

Behavioral Analysis

Advanced analytics track communication patterns, voting behavior, and social dynamics for unprecedented insights.

Console-quality gaming experience with stunning visuals, immersive sound design, and seamless cross-platform play.

How It Works

Three simple steps to experience the future of social deduction

01

Join a Game

Enter a room with up to 10 players. AI personalities are randomly assigned human names for perfect anonymity.

02

Play & Analyze

Engage in discussions, cast votes, and use your detective skills to identify AI players among the humans.

03

Master the Game

Learn each AI's unique tells and patterns. Develop strategies to outsmart both artificial and human opponents.
